pages.text: $(li)The Hero of the Village is a status effect granted when you defeat a $(l:patchouli:illagers/raid)Raid$(/l).$(br)$(li)While this effect is active, $(l:patchouli:villagers/villager)Villagers$(/l) will offer you discounts in their trades.$(br)$(li)This effect does not work with the $(l:patchouli:villagers/wandering_trader)Wandering Trader$(/l).
